page.title: 12Housing in Salem & District
page.content: {HOUSING}-Currently planning permission is only granted for bungalows within the immediate confines of the village. 95% of homes are owner - occupied, 5% rented by private individuals. There are no council houses. 1 prefabricated home in the village (26/62), 1 mobile home (26/61) . The village centre has doubled its size in 5 yrs. In the out- lying areas, 90% of the farmhouses have been renovated to include an inside toilet and bathroom. Some 20% of the farms have lost their original character due to the influx of non - farming population who demand all the modern conveniences. A sizeable number of the houses in the district are at least a hundred years old.
